Reference

All functions

convert_to_date_time()

Convert values to date/time

convert_to_decimal()

Convert date/time or radians to decimal time

convert_to_rad()

Convert date/time or decimal hours to radians

data_example()

Get path to data example

flat_posixt()

Flat dates of POSIXt objects

is_time()

Check if a object is a date/time type

mctq

A MCTQ core dataset

mctq_shift

A MCTQ Shift dataset

micro_mctq

A \(\mu\)MCTQ dataset

midday_change()

Change dates by time of day

model_data()

Return a model data for the MCTQ
